The best move is b2a1 and the evaluation is -452. Explain why b2a1 is the best move.
label: Black keeps control of b5 & c4 to restrain Na3 and this leaves White helpless. The big pawn at b2 is the cornerstone of White's position (remarkably) and it's about to disappear. This was a rather amazing game in that White avoided the obviouly necessary d2-d4 and was punished severely.
